You need a free API ID from AChecker to use this module.
Register here: http://achecker.ca/register.php to obtain one.
id, string, your AChecker API ID
guide, string, the accessbility guideline to validate against.
Choices: 508, WCAG1-A, WCAG1-AA, WCAG1-AAA, WCAG2-A, WCAG2-AA, WCAG2-AAA, BITV1, STANCA
